skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I have experience with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. I have also worked with Firebase and certain API's.

skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have mostly worked with React.js and have experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.description: I am certified in Machine Learning through IBM and have experience with Python and TensorFlow.

skills.title: Software Development
skills.description: I have experience with Java, C, and Python along with experience with Git and GitHub. I also have knowledge of Agile and Scrum methodologies.

portfolio.title: FitFolio - Fitness App
portfolio.description: Developed a comprehensive React web application, FitFolio, serving as a centralized repository for gym enthusiasts to access avast database of exercises sourced from ExerciseDB.

portfolio.title: Arduino Alarm System
portfolio.description: Created an alarm system using the Arduino Uno R3 with an ultrasonic sensor that will buzz an active buzzer if the sensor detects a person within 1 foot of the sensor

portfolio.title: Personal Website
portfolio.description: Made a personal website using React for the front end, Express.js with Node.js for the back end. The website is fully responsive and has a clean and modern design.
